#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

#define EPS 1e-9

double dp[2501][1251];

double f(int a,int b)
{
    //printf("called %d %d\n", a, b);
    if( a == 0 )
        return 0;
    if( dp[a][b] >= 1 )
        return dp[a][b];
    double ret = 0;
    double p1 = (double)b/(double)a;
    double q1 = 1.0 - p1;
    if( b > 0 ) ret += p1 * ( 1.0 + f(a-1,b-1) );
    if( a >= b + 2 ){
        ret += q1 * ( 1 + f(a-2,b) ) / (double)(a-1);
        ret += q1 * ( 2 + f(a-2,b) ) * (double)b / (double)(a-1);
        if( a >= b + 4 ) ret += q1 * ( 1 + f(a-2,b+2) ) * (double) (a-b-2) / (double)(a-1);
    }
    return ( dp[a][b] = ret );
}

int main()
{
    for(int i=1;i<=50;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=50;j++)
            if( i*j % 2 == 0 )
                f(i*j,0);
    int N,M;
    while( scanf("%d%d", &N, &M) != EOF ){
        printf("%.4lf\n", dp[N*M][0] );
    }   
    return 0;
}
